channel.title: Spec Error Help Please?
channel.description:
i think this is in the right spoto i got this HUGE problem when i try to spec the spec go away but it dnt do the graphics then i get this error in my cmd
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/21vaxj.png[/img]

item.title: Spec Error Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

combatassistant line 2973 is if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null && c.playerIndex > 0{
for the other combatassistant.java line 258 is activateSpecial(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], i); return;

client.java line 1424 getCombat().attackNpc(npcIndex);

playerhandler.java line 142 players[i].process();

Read full topic

CTRL+G enter line id.

item.title: Spec Error Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“soldierslim2, post:1, topic:415896”][9/24/11 11:14 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 562 [9/24/11 11:14 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial(CombatAssistant.java:2973) [9/24/11 11:14 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combatassistant.java:258) [9/24/11 11:14 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1424) [9/24/11 11:14 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:142)[/quote]

That code isn’t javascript lol

By the lines, he meant inside of the .java files - what does it say in CombatAssistant.java on line 2973? What about Combatassistant.java line 258? Client.java line 1424, PlayerHandler.java line 142.

Read full topic
